sentences.sentence: Multiple meningiomas may also be associated with neurofibromatosis.
sentences.translation: 多发性的脊膜瘤可能也伴有神经纤维瘤病。

sentences.sentence: Objective to detect the mutation on exons 32, 33 of Chinese the neurofibromatosis type 1 (NF1) gene.
sentences.translation: 目的检测中国人神经纤维瘤病1型(nf1)基因32、33外显子突变。

sentences.sentence: X-ray findings of the changes of bones with neurofibromatosis in 30 cases are analysed and discussed.
sentences.translation: 本文对30例多发神经纤维瘤病骨骼改变的X线所见做了分析和讨论。
